name: Douga de Puzzle Da! Puppukupuu
overview: Douga de puzzle da! Puppukupuu is a jigsaw puzzle game with a lot different puzzles and game modes for the player to enjoy for hours. The game features an easy gameplay and also features a movie image instead of the classic static images view in the puzzles. The main game modes are for just one player, and to advance in these games the player have to clear each stage. The game features also different 2 player vs modes.
